entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Beaverlodge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:09 AM MST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -17.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Beaverlodge 01:00 AM MST Thursday 29 December 2022

Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 84 %

Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 7:59 PM MST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 7:59 PM MST Wednesday 28 December 2022
